divs: Sighting Detailshusband and myself walking out of home improvement store facing east turned left to walk to car now facing north cloudy sky due to hurricane rita but break in black clouds moving rapidly suddenly i noticed in corner of my right eye light shining behind black cloud and when it passed break in clouds we both saw very big bright light blue ball surrounded by orange light and then it was gone we waited for a sound of an explosion but nothing ever happened everyone telling us it was a meteor but we feel it was something else and no meteor hit was ever reported in news media and this ball would have definitely caused a very big explosion as it hit the ground and left a very big hole.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Royal Palm Beach
There were no other sightings in Royal Palm Beach on or around September 25th 2005
